short.am,ar,bg,bn,ca,cs,da,de,el,en,en_AU,en_G: xFanatical Safe Doc smooths the way for schools managing Google Workspace for Education features (Docs, Sheets, Slides, Classroom,‚Ä¶

long.am,ar,bg,bn,ca,cs,da,de,el,en,en_AU,en_G:
xFanatical Safe Doc smooths the way for schools managing Google Workspace for Education features (Docs, Sheets, Slides, Classroom, Drive etc.) that Google Admin Console doesn't provide. It protects your students from inappropriate content and prevent your students from misusing certain features to disrupt classrooms.

=====================================
Features
=====================================
In Google Docs Editors
‚ñ∫ Block the image searching feature 
‚ñ∫ Block Youtube video searching feature
‚ñ∫ Block the Dictionary feature 
‚ñ∫ Block inappropriate emojis, e.g. the middle finger emoji, poop emoji or knife emoji.
‚ñ∫ Block inserting GIFs and stickers 
‚ñ∫ Block inserting images by URLs into Docs
‚ñ∫ Block the "Publish to the web" feature 
‚ñ∫ Block the "Email this file" feature (formerly "Email as attachment") 
‚ñ∫ Block the "Email collaborators" feature 
‚ñ∫ Disable spell & grammar checking
‚ñ∫ Disable the voice typing feature
‚ñ∫ Disable the "Translate document" feature 
‚ñ∫ Disable the "Make a copy" feature 
‚ñ∫ Disable the Comment feature
‚ñ∫ Block certain web-linked functions in Sheets, e.g. IMPORTDATA, IMPORTFEED, IMPORTHTML, IMAGE etc.
‚ñ∫ Stop students from sharing Drive files with each other
‚ñ∫ Disable the chat feature when multiple users join in the same document

In Google Classroom
‚ñ∫ Remove the "People" tab to protect students' privacy
‚ñ∫ Block preview pop ups for unsafe links, and the link preview in Stream > Add Link
‚ñ∫ Disable students unsubmitting / resubmitting / late turning in / empty turning in assignment works

In Google Search
‚ñ∫ Block distracting doodle games and toys 
‚ñ∫ Block Youtube embedded videos in Google Search results
‚ñ∫ Block doodles in the search home page and search result pages.

In Google Meet
‚ñ∫ Stop students from adding external people 
‚ñ∫ Hide student identities (full names) for privacy protection
‚ñ∫ Remove phone joining options to prevent unauthorized external people from joining the session.
‚ñ∫ Block students rejoining old unsupervised meetings (meetings without a nickname and open for students to join)


Generally
‚ñ∫ Support configurations for different age groups. Admins can decide which features in GSFE to be disabled or enabled
‚ñ∫ Support Managed Chromebooks and Chrome browsers on Windows and Mac
‚ñ∫ Support US and UK English

Discover all the xFanatical Safe Doc policies that simply your feature management in Google Workspace for Education. https://xfanatical.com/blog/safe-doc-configuration/#safe-doc-policy-list. 

------------------------------

Quick Start
For home use üè†
‚ñ∫ Login your Chrome profile using an @gmail account and turn on sync.
‚ñ∫ Click [Add to Chrome] above to install the extension.
‚ñ∫ You will be popped up with guidelines.
‚ñ∫ Not all features not 
For school use üè´
‚ñ∫ Request a license in https://xfanatical.com/product/safe-doc/#trial
‚ñ∫ Deploy xFanatical Safe Doc in your test OU. 
‚ñ∫ Configure and explore the features

Pricing
‚ñ∫ FREE for any @gmail accounts.
‚ñ∫ $499/year for a single student domain with unlimited users, product updates and premier support. See more details in the xFanatical Safe Doc Pricing page https://xfanatical.com/product/safe-doc/#pricing
‚ñ∫  Get a 30-days trial license at https://xfanatical.com/product/safe-doc/#trial

Support? 
‚ñ∫ Self service help documentation at https://xfanatical.com/product/safe-doc/support
‚ñ∫ Email us at support@xfanatical.com or https://xfanatical.com/contact-us/
‚ñ∫ Join xFanatical Safe Doc community (Google Group). Ask questions, request features, report issues and receive software update news. https://groups.google.com/a/xfanatical.com/g/safedoc-community
